meta.title: Hire front-end developers
meta.description: This is Codex Software landing page

textBoxes.title: Developers for Hire
textBoxes.text: Engage a front-end developer or a full-service development team

textBoxes.title: Product development
textBoxes.text: Use our front-end expertise to develop the interface for your software product

textBoxes.title: Software Modernisation
textBoxes.text: Migrate outdated Javascript components to modern front-end frameworks.

textBoxes.title: Mobile App Development
textBoxes.text: Use our expertise to build a modern mobile app for iOS, Android or multiple platforms.

imageArticle.title: Software Engineers For your Project
imageArticle.subtitle: Hire Front-end or Fullstack developers to get the optimal cost, timeframe and results of the project.
list: Any duration: from short-term assignments to complete projects
Affordably: save up to 40% of costs if compared to hiring for the in-house team

textBoxes2.title: What to expect hiring Codex Software

textBoxes.title: TOP-10% Engineering Talent
textBoxes.text: We value good hard- and soft-skills. On average, only 10% of candidates receive job offers from us.

textBoxes.title: Flawless Communication
textBoxes.text: We make sure all team members possess English fluency to effectively communicate verbally and in writing.

textBoxes.title: Availability During Business Hours
textBoxes.text: Our development centers are located in European timezones, ensuring comfortable overlaps with clients from all over the world.

textBoxes.title: Unparallelled Flexibility
textBoxes.text: Hire developers of any seniority, for any duration. Scale the team up & down easily on demand.

textBoxes.title: No Administrative Overheads
textBoxes.text: We manage the HR side, including talent acquisition, replacements, compensations, training, and legal aspects.

textBoxes.title: Your Rights Fully Protected
textBoxes.text: We take all possible legal and technical measures to ensure your sensitive information, including code and ideas, remain safe and secure.

imageBoxes.title: OneFlow Systems
imageBoxes.description: We partnered with OneFlow Systems in 2013 to help them build their printing software platform. Both teams worked hand in hand from the very beginning until the acquisition of the product by HP Inc., and beyond.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Their services were crucial during product development and contributed much to the successful closure of the deal. We won’t be able to achieve this without Codex.”

imageBoxes.title: HP Inc
imageBoxes.description: After the acquisition of OneFlow Systems’ platform, we continued to support HP Inc. in building the Siteflow platform and PrintOS infrastructure. Our specialists are also involved in other software projects and digital initiatives of the corporation.
imageBoxes.testimonial: “Codex have provided me with a great team for more than a decade. High quality engineers and managers that understand the dynamics of my business. I look forward to our relationship continuing”

imageBoxes.title: Axis.xyz
imageBoxes.description: We've helped Axis.xyz, a business intelligence and data analytics platform for the investment sector, develop a comprehensive BI software solution able to retrieve and analyse data from numerous sources, and visualise it via custom dashboards equipped with complex (over 500 custom nodes) interactive social graphs.

imageBoxes.title: 3D Pack Pro
imageBoxes.description: 3D Pack Pro is a web-to-print solution for packaging service providers that allows them to construct and customize packaging items on the fly, expanding the customer reach and improving customer satisfaction.

messageInput.label: Message
messageInput.placeholder: Share your requirements, ask a question, or request a free consultation
